properties.description: Split the source file with huge size to small chunks in multipe
This data flow separates the error records to separate file.
Split the source file by country

source.sqlReaderQuery:
drop table if exists temp

SELECT *, ((ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY Date ASC)  - 1)/5000) AS BatchID INTO TEMP
  FROM [dbo].[covidhospitalization] ORDER BY BatchID

SELECT distinct BatchID  FROM TEMP ORDER BY BatchID

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS Temp
SELECT 1 AS A

properties.description: This pipeline splits the data to multiple records using Flatten transformation
Divert the error records to separate table using data flow
This pipeline writes stats to csv file. On daily basis, for first run it should create a new file with date.csv and next consecutive runs, it should append data.
This implement SCD Type#1 where records will update if exists else insert.
